title: Building Blocks of the Deep Learning Model
text:
The Perceptron
There has to be enough stimulus to trigger the neuron. That is a function of what comes in (the input signals, scaled by the weights), and the bias which is inherent to each neuron. Biological neurons have a threshold, and if the stimulus is above that threshold, the neuron fires.
\[ y = f(\sum_{i=1}^{n} w_i x_i + b) \]
